page.title: 11Origins of Bletchley People
page.content: We did a survey on people who lived in our part of Bletchley. We found that most people who live here now have come from other places.Nearly half the people who now live in Bletchley have come here from London,and another quarter come from the Home Counties, only one tenth were born here. Most people had moved from London because they could get a better house here and also it was easier to find a job. They also found that it was better for their children than living in a big town. Most people had lived in Bletchley for beetween 10 and 30 years and nearly everyone we asked said they liked it here,were glad they moved and wanted to stay here.
